EmailTemplate.name: CEASE & DESIST 2 - DOMAIN NAME CEASE AND DESIST REMINDER
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber}: Cease & Desist - Second Notice of Trademark Infringement: {!Case.Customer_Lab_Result__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Note: when replying to this email, please select “Reply All” and ensure that “Subject” line begins with the case number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
Dear Addressee or To Whom It May Concern {!Case.Customer_Lab_Result__c}:
On checking your [“your client’s” in the case of a Registrar and private hosting] file we note that you [your client] have not responded to our letter of DATE OF ORIGINAL LETTER.
We are attaching a copy of our letter and now urge you [your client] to immediately attend to this matter within 5 business days from the date of this notification; otherwise we will forward this matter to our Legal Department for further action.
If you have any questions concerning the proper identification of our trademarks, please feel free to contact us at brand.protection@dupont.com or by fax at 302-380-3509.
Thank you for your cooperation.
Sincerely,
DuPont Brand Protection Center
(Attach original letter)
